page.shortlink: api objects table object unmark function
page.discussion: The <TBL>.UNMARK() method unmarks the current record. Note : To unmark all records use <TBL>.UNMARK_RANGE().
page.example: dim tb as P tb = table.open("customer") tb.fetch_first() tb.change_begin(.t.) tb.mark() ? tb.is_marked() = .T. tb.unmark() ? tb.is_marked() = .F.
